description:
This official app of the Chicago Blackhawks brings fans closer to the team than ever before.  Get live game coverage, player interviews, game previews and recaps, postgame video highlights, enhanced stats, customized game alerts, player profiles and much more!  Follow the Blackhawks all season long on your mobile device!

Blackhawks App Features Include:
•	Live Game Coverage with Near Real-Time Shift Changes, Player Stats, Boxscore and Play-by-Play
•	Post-Game Video Highlights
•	Customized Game Alerts
•	Breaking News
•	Video on Demand 
•	Photo Galleries
•	Team Twitter and Instagram Feeds
•	Full Season Schedule 
•	League Standings
•	Team Roster, Player Profiles and Stats


If you consent to receive push notifications, you will receive game information, news updates, and other information on your device from the NHL and the Chicago Blackhawks, based on your account settings and preferences, which may be customized on a team or league level.  You may withdraw your consent to receive push notifications at any time by disabling the notification or alert type within the Settings section of the App, which is accessible at the bottom of the main menu.  NHL Interactive CyberEnterprises, LLC, 1185 Avenue of the Americas, New York, NY 10036 | NHL.com; Chicago Blackhawks, United Center, 1901 W Madison St, Chicago, IL 60612 | blackhawks.nhl.com
releaseNotes:
Follow the Blackhawks throughout the entire 2014-15 NHL Season.  Update your app to get news, stats, highlights, and in-game alerts for every Blackhawks game.

iOS8 Compliant
